mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mt_${r_city}_reply VALUES(#{r_city},(SELECT NVL(MAX(r_seq),1)+1 FROM mt_${r_city}_reply), #{r_select},#{r_num},#{r_id},#{r_content},sysdate,#{r_root},#{r_step,sysdate})
mapper.update: UPDATE mt_${r_city}_reply SET r_content=#{r_content} r_updateDate=sysdate WHERE r_seq=#{r_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM mt_1_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_2_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_3_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_4_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_5_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_6_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_7_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_8_reply ) WHERE r_id=#{p_id} ORDER BY r_select)

SELECT count(*) FROM( SELECT * FROM mt_1_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_2_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_3_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_4_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_5_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_6_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_7_reply UNION SELECT * FROM mt_8_reply) WHERE r_id=#{p_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE mt_${r_city}_reply SET r_root = r_seq where r_seq = (select max(r_seq) from mt_${r_city}_reply)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM((SELECT ROWNUM,mt_${p_city}_reply.* FROM mt_${p_city}_reply WHERE r_city = #{p_city} AND r_select = #{p_select} AND r_num = #{p_seq}) ORDER BY r_root DESC,r_step ASC,r_date ASC) WHERE ROWNUM >=#{p_end} AND ROWNUM <=#{p_start}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mt_${p_city}_reply where r_num =#{p_seq}
